name: Mugger's Delight
description:
My third Ludum Dare!

There is a peaceful park. There are some peaceful hipsters and some peaceful cops just living their peaceful lives.
Your are a mugger. You threaten them! You take their money!
There are more cops now! You hire bodyguards. Cops and bodyguards fight! You get caught...

Controls:
- arrow keys to move
- space key to hire a bodyguard for 5$

Used tools:
- Unity3D 2017.2.0
- Photoshop
- Audacity
- https://soundation.com/studio
- Fonts: Acme

LD40-URL: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/muggers-delight

Thanks for playing :)

Daniel "xoidberg" Hein
